graphql.query:
mutation updateOrganization ($after: String, $first: Int, $searchPhrase: String, $after1: String, $first1: Int, $searchPhrase1: String, $command: InputUpdateOrganizationType!) {
    updateOrganization (command: $command) {
        businessCategory
        contacts (after: $after1, first: $first1, searchPhrase: $searchPhrase1) {
            edges {
                cursor
                node {
                    birthDate
                    firstName
                    fullName
                    id
                    lastName
                    memberType
                    middleName
                    name
                    organizationId
                    organizations {
										items{
                        businessCategory
                        description
                        emails
                        groups
                        id
                        memberType
                        name
                        outerId
                        ownerId
                        parentId
                        phones
                        seoObjectType
										}
                    }
                    organizationsIds
                    outerId
                    phones
                    securityAccounts {
                        accessFailedCount
                        createdBy
                        createdDate
                        email
                        emailConfirmed
                        id
                        isAdministrator
                        lockoutEnabled
                        lockoutEnd
                        memberId
                        modifiedBy
                        modifiedDate
                        normalizedEmail
                        normalizedUserName
                        passwordExpired
                        permissions
                        phoneNumber
                        phoneNumberConfirmed
                        photoUrl
                        securityStamp
                        storeId
                        twoFactorEnabled
                        userName
                        userType
                    }
                }
            }
            items {
                birthDate
                firstName
                fullName
                id
                lastName
                memberType
                middleName
                name
                organizationId
                organizations {
										items{
                    businessCategory
                    contacts (after: $after, first: $first, searchPhrase: $searchPhrase) {
                        totalCount
                    }
                    description
                    emails
                    groups
                    id
                    memberType
                    name
                    outerId
                    ownerId
                    parentId
                    phones
                    seoObjectType
                }}
                organizationsIds
                outerId
                phones
                securityAccounts {
                    accessFailedCount
                    contact {
                        birthDate
                        firstName
                        fullName
                        id
                        lastName
                        memberType
                        middleName
                        name
                        organizationId
                        organizationsIds
                        outerId
                        phones
                    }
                    createdBy
                    createdDate
                    email
                    emailConfirmed
                    id
                    isAdministrator
                    lockoutEnabled
                    lockoutEnd
                    memberId
                    modifiedBy
                    modifiedDate
                    normalizedEmail
                    normalizedUserName
                    passwordExpired
                    permissions
                    phoneNumber
                    phoneNumberConfirmed
                    photoUrl
                    roles {
                        description
                        id
                        name
                        normalizedName
                        permissions
                    }
                    securityStamp
                    storeId
                    twoFactorEnabled
                    userName
                    userType
                }
            }
            pageInfo {
                endCursor
                hasNextPage
                hasPreviousPage
                startCursor
            }
            totalCount
        }
        description
        emails
        groups
        id
        memberType
        name
        outerId
        ownerId
        parentId
        phones
        seoObjectType
    }
}

mutation updateContact ( $command: InputUpdateContactType!) {
updateContact (command: $command) {
fullName
id
lastName
name
organizationId
addresses{
          items{
          addressType
          key
          city
          countryCode
          countryName
          email
          firstName
          lastName
          id
          line1
          line2
          middleName
          name phone
          postalCode
          regionId
          regionName
          zip
          }}
}
}

graphql.query:
query user(
  $id: String
  $userName: String
  $email: String
  $loginProvider: String
  $providerKey: String
) {
  user(
    id: $id
    userName: $userName
    email: $email
    loginProvider: $loginProvider
    providerKey: $providerKey
  ) {
    id
    isAdministrator
        userName
    email
    storeId
    userName
    userType
    securityStamp
    roles{
      id
      name
      description
      permissions
    }
  }
}
